
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52192991">
C语言快速排序：<br>
<div class="parsedown-markdown"><pre><code>#include &lt;stdio.h&gt;
#define N 100010
int n = 0;
int a[N];

void paixu(int a[], int left, int right) 
{
&nbsp; &nbsp; if(left &gt;= right)&nbsp; &nbsp;//如果指针相遇说明排完本轮，则开始返回递归
&nbsp; &nbsp; {
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;return;
&nbsp; &nbsp; }&nbsp; &nbsp;
&nbsp; &nbsp; int i = left - 1;
&nbsp; &nbsp; int j = right + 1;
&nbsp; &nbsp; int mid = a[(left + right)/2];
&nbsp; &nbsp; while(i &lt; j)
&nbsp; &nbsp; {
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;do
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;i++;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; //防止死循环
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}while(a[i] &lt; mid);

&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;do
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;j--;
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}while(a[j] &gt; mid);

&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;if(i &lt; j)
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;int temp = a[i];
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;a[i] = a[j];
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;a[j] = temp;
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
&nbsp; &nbsp; }

&nbsp; &nbsp; paixu(a,left,j);
&nbsp; &nbsp; paixu(a,j+1,right);

}

int main()
{
&nbsp; &nbsp; scanf("%d",&amp;n);
&nbsp; &nbsp; for(int i = 0; i &lt; n; i++) //输入
&nbsp; &nbsp; {
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;scanf("%d",&amp;a[i]);
&nbsp; &nbsp; }

&nbsp; &nbsp; paixu(a,0,n-1);

&nbsp; &nbsp; for(int i = 0; i &lt; n; i++)&nbsp;&nbsp;//输出
&nbsp; &nbsp; {
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;printf("%d ",a[i]);
&nbsp; &nbsp; }

&nbsp; &nbsp; return 0;

}</code></pre></div>
<div class="parsedown-markdown-end_FLAG_ZXSQ" style="display:none"></div></td></tr></tbody></table>
